        This method extracts claim information using token and given function
        Parameters:
        token - Jwt token of current session
        claimsResolver - function of Claims class that is mapped to retrieve information
        Returns:
        The information that is retrieved using token

      • createToken

        Parameters:

        username - Username of the current user
